note:
I'm like a potato, beneath the earth, but not quite ripe for consumption.

I also write music. I am somewhat of a [insert something computer:y] hobbyist. I used to write stuff publicly, I got tired of it; I can't relate to the zeitgeist. I'm sort of shy.

Intermittently I play one (two, tops) game intensely. Sometimes I move on to another game. Usually one I've already played.

In my personal life I dislike change. On a societal level I tend to lean towards revolutionary (egalitarian) upheaval.
